en: A friendly beta-tester who says they're an English teacher attempts to gently point out a problem you have with your text - there are typos everywhere. It looks unprofessional, but you're not sure you're the person who has the time or the grammatical knowledge to fix it. Hire a proofreader?
You hire the proofreader. It cost a chunk, but it's worth it for the peace of mind and added professionalism.
You decide you can't afford a proofreader right now - but you spend the next few days combing for errors, hoping it doesn't look as unprofessional as the beta-tester says.
